page.title: 11COBHAY FARM
page.content: Cobhay Farm is istuated in the middle of our block. It's entrance is a lane leading to the farm and it's three cottages.There are 4 families living there with a population of 15.The farm has 90 acres used for grazing cows.The milk they produce is sold.A modern milking machine is used plus tractors and a baler for hay making when the farm is at its busiest.The owner of the farm and another person run the farm and the farmers wife works in an old peoples home as well.Holidays are few on a farm as busy as this one. There are few interesting landmarks or orchards in the area but there are 2 ponds and plenty of woodland.The farm has been in the same family for over 100 years.
